overview: The Oddness Begins... What is it about that horror movie on channel 12? Why do so many women in this small town work for the same party entertainment service? What is the significance of their bubble baths? Why so much yogurt? Where did that eyeball come from? Who is Bob?  Odd Noggins is a strange trip into a small town where nothing is quite what it seems to be.
title: Odd Noggins
